title: Ticket #5394: Add a test for submit for each slices
description: This ticket will be used to track the addition of tests to check the working of slices in HTCondor submit files.
remarks:
2015-Dec-14 10:38:40 by tim:
CODE REVIEW: Good updates to the tests. Only test code changed, no chance for regression.
check_ins:
2015-Dec-03 16:50   Check-in [46344]: condor_tests: #5394 follow guidlines to print logs Make the test case compatible to the guidlines for printing logs. - Remove prints which exist only to debug the scripts - Use TLOG to print important information (By Mihir Shete )
2015-Dec-02 10:38   Check-in [46334]: condor_tests: #5394 handle negative values in slices Add code to calculate the expected output when slice definition contains negative or out of bound values. Also add tests for validating such cases. (By Mihir Shete )
2015-Dec-02 10:37   Check-in [46333]: condor_tests: #5394 remove timestamp prints The timestamp prints are unnecessary, remove them. Just add a print indicating the start of the test. (By Mihir Shete )
2015-Nov-30 11:35   Check-in [46307]: condor_tests: #5394 add support for tweaking slices Add support for tweaking the slices in test data. This commit makes the test more comprehensive. (By Mihir Shete )
2015-Nov-23 14:32   Check-in [46290]: condor_tests: #5394 test with different input sets Modularize the script so that it can be run for different input sets. Also add different input sets to verify the slice functionality of the HTCondor's submit files. (By Mihir Shete )
2015-Nov-23 14:32   Check-in [46289]: condor_tests: #5394 remove excessive logging Remove the excessive logs printed while running slice tests, print logs only when a scenario is failing. (By Mihir Shete )
creator: smihir
